General.Name: Datametrex AI Limited
General.Description: Datametrex AI Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides collecting, analyzing, and presenting structured and unstructured data using its patented machine learning and artificial intelligence in Canada and South Korea. The company operates through two segments, AI and Technology and Health Security. It offers health security services, such as COVID-19 related, concierge medical, and telemedicine services, as well as big data, artificial intelligence, and system integration services. The company also sells Covid-19 test kits. In addition, it provides AnalyticsGPT, an AI technology solution; NexaSecurity, a social media discovery and monitoring platform; and Medi-Call, a subscription service that connects its clients with a primary care team to address all health and wellness needs. Further, the company offers mobile charging services, EV charging stations, Mobile EV chargers, and AC EV chargers. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 2300 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4P 1E4
